snippet: The combined number of military advisers helping Iraq forces in their fight against the Islamic State would be 4,500.
abstract: American military officials say allies in campaign against Islamic State group have agreed to send 1,500 troops to join American soldiers and military personnel who are advising and training Iraqi and Kurdish troops.
lead_paragraph: The combined number of military advisers helping Iraq forces in their fight against the Islamic State would be 4,500.
